source.description: Official solver script used as ground truth (no solve.md present).

points.description: Extract the embedded bytecode/constants from the binary (as QWORDs).
points.evidence: solve/solve.py parses a hex blob into `struct.unpack('265Q', data)`.

points.description: Determine the fixed offsets for dividend and divisor within each per-character block.
Compute `dividend % divisor` for each block and join the chars to form the flag.
points.evidence: solve/solve.py computes remainders and builds the flag string.

evaluation.notes: The writeup covers bytecode extraction, layout, and modulo reconstruction.
